concept.title: Change Data Capture
concept.shortdesc: When reading from Microsoft SQL Server, JDBC Consumer can group row updates from the same transaction when reading from a change log table. This maintains consistency when performing change data capture.

conbody.p: JDBC Consumer originchange data captureTo enable this feature, specify the transaction ID column and maximum transaction size. When these properties are defined, JDBC Consumer processes data as a batch up to the maximum transaction size, overriding the maximum batch size.
When the transaction is larger than the maximum transaction size, JDBC Consumer uses multiple batches as needed.
To preserve transactional integrity, increase the maximum transaction size as necessary. Note that setting this property too high can cause out of memory errors.
